In England, in the seven days to 15 August, there were 175,504 new confirmed cases (310.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 August, there were 171,111 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (4,393 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 August is 5,608,339 (9,917.5 cases per 100,000 population).
